description.j1: Normalised velocity error metric (vs kOmegaSST baseline)
description.j2: Normalised vorticity error metric (vs kOmegaSST baseline)
description.J: Combined error metric (average of j1 and j2)
description.rmse_velocity: Root Mean Square Error for velocity vs HF (m/s)
description.rmse_vorticity: Root Mean Square Error for vorticity vs HF (1/s)
description.mae_velocity: Mean Absolute Error for velocity vs HF (m/s)
description.mae_vorticity: Mean Absolute Error for vorticity vs HF (1/s)
description.relative_rmse_velocity: Relative RMSE for velocity vs HF (absolute percentage, 0-100 scale)
description.relative_rmse_vorticity: Relative RMSE for vorticity vs HF (absolute percentage, 0-100 scale)
description.relative_mae_velocity: Relative MAE for velocity vs HF (absolute percentage, 0-100 scale)
description.relative_mae_vorticity: Relative MAE for vorticity vs HF (absolute percentage, 0-100 scale)
description.rmse_velocity_kosst: RMSE for kOmegaSST velocity vs HF (m/s) - baseline
description.rmse_vorticity_kosst: RMSE for kOmegaSST vorticity vs HF (1/s) - baseline
description.mae_velocity_kosst: MAE for kOmegaSST velocity vs HF (m/s) - baseline
description.mae_vorticity_kosst: MAE for kOmegaSST vorticity vs HF (1/s) - baseline
description.converged: Whether the simulation converged (False if max iterations reached)
